primary.context: Caller wanted to pay fees but could not find contract ID
primary.detail: AI failed to verify the account using the provided account number and transferred to concierge.

steps: Caller requested to make a payment.
AI attempted to identify the caller and requested a phone number.
Caller did not know the phone number on file.
Caller provided an account number instead.
AI attempted account lookup with the provided number and failed.
AI transferred the caller to the concierge department.

impediment.detail: Account lookup failed after the caller provided an account number instead of a contract ID.

clarifications.note: Clarifying which ID types are acceptable

actions.detail: Lookup failed using provided account number 872100275210
Transfer to concierge after verification failure

insights.summary: The caller wanted to make a payment but didn't have their contract ID or phone number on file. After providing an account number, the AI failed to verify the account and transferred the call to concierge.
insights.verbatim: I don't know what number I have on my contract. I've got a vacation ID. An account number, Which one do you want?
